Event definition: The words in this frame involve an Undesirable_event which affects the Patient negatively.  No agent need be involved.  The first calamity was a disastrous trade war with Holland.  It is sad to have to make a living by grubbing around in the dirt of a national calamity.  The result has been catastrophic.
input: Disaster readiness fund urged [ North Carolina ]

Event definition: In this frame a Speaker asks an Addressee for something, or to carry out some action.
input: Disaster readiness fund urged [ North Carolina ]

Event definition: A Helper benefits a Benefited_party by enabling the culmination of a Goal that the Benefited_party has.  A Focal_entity that is involved in reaching the Goal may stand in for it.
input: `` The General Assembly should set aside money for a new state health lab , millions of doses of antiviral drugs and a fund to help meet basic needs after a disaster , a legislative panel recommended Thursday .
